properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued February 12 at 4:15AM EST until February 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Lakeshore Flood Warning, which is in effect from 7 AM EST /6 AM
CST/ Thursday to 1 AM EST /midnight CST/ Friday. The Lakeshore
Flood Watch is no longer in effect.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING AND BEACH EROSION...Northwest to north winds
of 20 mph with gusts to 35 mph will generate wave heights of 10
to 14 feet along the shoreline.

* Timing...Thursday into Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Another round of severe beach erosion and lakeshore
flooding is imminent. Strong north to northwest winds, along
with record high Lake Michigan water levels, will create strong
wave action along the coast.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Warning means that flooding is occurring or
imminent along the lake. Residents on or near the shore in the
warned area should be alert for rising water...and take
appropriate action to protect life and property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ FRIDAY
